name: microsoft-edge
title: Microsoft Edge
description: Search open tabs, bookmarks, collections and history in Microsoft Edge.
author: KartikKumarSahoo

commands.name: search-tab
commands.title: Search Tabs
commands.subtitle: Microsoft Edge
commands.description: Search in all tabs and go to the selected.

commands.name: new-tab
commands.title: New Tab
commands.subtitle: Microsoft Edge
commands.description: Open a new Microsoft Edge tab and also see existing open tabs to choose from.

commands.name: copy-active-tab-url
commands.title: Copy Active Tab URL
commands.subtitle: Microsoft Edge
commands.description: Copy active tab URL in Microsoft Edge to Clipboard.

preferences.name: buildChoice
preferences.title: Choose the build you want to use

preferences.name: openTabInProfile
preferences.title: Open tab in profile
preferences.description: When 'Default(classic), the tab will be opened in the profile open, or topmost profile window if multiple windows are open. When 'Current Profile', the tab will be opened in the profile specified in the 'Profile' field. When 'Original Profile' it will open in original profile tab is sourced from

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
